description: Cranberry&nbsp;Martini is a refreshing twist on the traditional vodka drink. The sweet and tart taste will leave your mouth watering for more! Cranberries are tangy, but not too much so that it competes with other flavors in this cocktail recipe.
name: Cranberry Martini
recipeIngredient: Granulated or superfine sugar for the rim (optional)
Fresh cranberries and a lemon wedge for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Run the lemon around the champagne glass and rim it with sugar.
recipeInstructions.text: Run the lemon around the champagne glass and rim it with sugar.

recipeInstructions.name: Place the vodka, cranberry juice, Cointreau, lemon juice, and syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake for 15 seconds until cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Place the vodka, cranberry juice, Cointreau, lemon juice, and syrup in a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake for 15 seconds until cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain the drink into a glass. Garnish with cranberries and a lemon wedge and serve.
